Sequence Information.Peptide Name: AM1 (A. marmelos peptide 1, Predicted AMPs, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: medicinal plant, Indian Bael fruit,Aegle marmelos, plants

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: proteome sequences were subjected to in-silico digestion followed by AMP prediction using the DBAASP server.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (41.67%) toBactrocerin-1K: 24%, A: 14%.Activity: active against S. aureus MRSA (MIC 2-8.5 ug/ml). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
Literature Information.Author: Awdhesh Kumar Mishra R, Kodiveri Muthukaliannan G.2024
Literature Information.Title: In-silico and in-vitro study of novel antimicrobial peptide AM1 from Aegle marmelos against drug-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
